Name: Final Fort
About the game: Official QQ group: 793025657 You will be humanity's last hope, building a watchtower fortress to fend off the endless hordes of zombies. Here, the zombies are endless, and they will destroy all obstacles that stand in their way. The watchtowers built will have many possibilities, and the quality of the construction will determine whether they are powerful or not. Minerals produced in mines are indispensable, and you need to ensure that all buildings are supplied with enough electricity for them to function. The walls are the best barrier against zombies, and you'll need to place fragile buildings behind them. Here, failure does not mean the end, as the last hope of this world, of course, you also have your golden finger, that is, no matter how many times you die, you can make yourself stronger by obtaining spars and cores. In a word...... Stick with it for a long time! In this game, as the commander of the Fort, you need to allocate resources, power, and defensive structures to defend against endless zombie attacks. At the same time, you also get a variety of core plug-ins with different qualities, equipping them with appropriate buildings to enhance their attributes These core mods can be carried into new battles As time goes on, zombies will evolve and become more powerful, but you should not be discouraged if you fail, because you can constantly fight to gain time crystals to increase your technology, how to build your own defenses, with the core components of their equipment is the core secret to last longer
